title: 这段代码在 Python 里能怎么改写成效率更高的吗，听说 for 循环比较慢
content:
```python
    xs = []
    ys = []
    zs = []
    for data in ls:
        _x, _y, _z = data
        xs.append(_x)
        ys.append(_y)
        zs.append(_z)
```
content_rendered:
xs = []
    ys = []
    zs = []
    for data in ls:
        _x, _y, _z = data
        xs.append(_x)
        ys.append(_y)
        zs.append(_z)
